煽り多すぎ、マナー悪すぎ
最初は無視してたけど、ある日ぽっきり心が折れてしまった。
楽しむためにゲームやってるのに、なんでこんな嫌がらせ受けなきゃいけないんだ？
ゲームやっててこんなに悲しい気持ちになったのは初めてです。

いろんな配信者を見てても、当然のようにVC使ってます。
VCPT相手だと、サバイバー側に外部ツールによるアドバンテージがある状態で試合させられます。

全体的に他者に攻撃的なプレイヤーが多く、キラー・サバイバー関係なくバッドマナーでもないことで、チャットで文句言われたりします。

育成にもすごく時間が掛かり、マッチシステムもクソなため、これからキラーを始める人は100時間以上マナーの悪いフル装備の経験者を相手にプレイし続けなければなりません。

サバイバーから触り、そのBPをキラーを回して育成が終わってからキラー始めるとよいと思います。

心が折れる瞬間を感じてみたい方にはお勧めします。
Muy buen juego 10/10

I have played the game on and off for years. I would say it is easily a game that can entertain you for a long while. I don't think I have even prestiged half of the survivors there are to play. That and the maps are getting better, there are more killers every 6 months to a year. I will probably never stop playing DBD, easily one of my favorites.

This is a great skill based game. You learn to dodge and kill better as the killer as you go. It has a steep learning curve, but once you get the hang of the game it becomes super fun. A great game to play with friends.

CAIPIRINHA DE CLIMÃO

INGREDIENTES:
50 ml da pior cachaça

1 limão

2 colheres (sopa) de açúcar

Gelo a gosto

MODO DE PREPARO:
Em um copo baixo de caipirinha, adicione 50 ml
(1 copo de shot).

Corte o limão siciliano em 2 gomos,
macere no dentro do copo baixo e adicione as duas colheres de mel.

Por fim, complete o copo com gelo e misture.

One of the best games I have played in a while. It still needs some balance changes, but it seems like the devs are taking it in the right direction. Overall I would rate it 8/10.

Très bon jeu, de bons graphismes, de belles mécaniques avec les tests pour a peu près tout, des maps très variées, des personnages plutôt cool (que ce soit survivants comme tueurs) avec des perks diverses (pas forcément toutes utiles pour jouer mais certaines sont très funs a jouer). Cependant il subsiste quelque points négatifs, en effet, le temps pour tag est souvent long le soir ou en journée (heure de travail et de cours), les tueurs qui s'amusent à camper (le tueur reste devant le crochet) et tunnel (le fait de poursuivre le même survivant jusqu'à le tuer) et les survivants toxics avec le tbag etc sont vraiment très relou. Il faudrait seulement changé ça.

O jogo é bem divertido dos dois lados da moeda, a mecânica do jogo é boa, mas repetitiva ao longo do tempo. Mas rende a diversão por conta dos diversos personagens e diferentes formas de obter novas mecânicas.

Fun game with unlimited possibilities of how to build your killer or survivor. The game has its issues but what game doesn't. I've been hooked since day 1. (get it...I said "been hooked" and in the game as a survivor you are hooked on meat hooks. Get it? Because I said hooked, which is a main game mechanic. So by me saying hooked meaning like "addicted" ANNNNND you actually get hooked in the game, its punny. This is joke)

It is interesting game at times, but it have major downplays. Like survivors running in circle for 15-20 minutes and game is practicaly very boring when this happens. It is quite common exploit and practicaly game is ruined. No point of running in circle for entire game. Other thing is toxic community. You get banned when you dont want to play with exploit gamers. I dont like this gameplay or dev attitude like this and uninstalled this... No thanx... And developer also promotes gay in game  and gay flags were everywhere. Just - go away from this. Recently they - also removed old skills and the matchmaking is just unbalanced. You get matches rookie/Noob vs PRO level too often. What a stupid idea. I remember playing against best PRO player in community with my rookie level killer. I wasted too much time on this...

Sempre fui fã de jogos e franquias de terror. Encontrar um jogo que combinasse os dois não falhou em chamar a minha atenção, me fazendo logo viciar. Ambas as mecânicas de sobrevivente e assassino são divertidas do seu próprio jeito, apesar de ainda ter bastante espaço para melhorias. Mesmo sendo curto, o período de rankeamento é bem feito, baseando-se na sua performance geral na partida ao invés do simples ganhar ou perder.
Enfim, Dead by Daylight é um jogo feito para quem se interessa pelo gênero horror e busca uma experiência multiplayer.

bom dms

I didnt recommend this game before and I definitely wont recommend it again.
Too much grind to unlock things, and I mean you need hundreds of hours just to purchase another character and level up other you already have, Some characters you cant even unlock unless you pay with real money. For a game that is not free to play this should be allowed.
Now to the balancing of game. I have 600 hours and I would say im pretty decent as survivor and really good as killer.
After last patch it is impossible to survive .Killers are absolutely overpowered.Today I have played around 20 games and I have  escaped only 2 times where all my other teammates died. So imagine how it is going to be for you if you are a new player. Dont do this to yourself its not worth it. People who work on this game are greedy fucks that dont care about gameplay. Only thing they care is your money.Dont give it to them. I have uninstalled the game today because its not playable.If you win as killer you dont feel any achievement  and as survivor it is impossible to escape unless you are litterally pro player that plays this game for 10+ hours per day

NO RECOMENDARIA ESTE JUEGO JAMAS. Lo he vuleto a desinstalar debido a q esta ahora mismo en la mierda el mmr es absurdo y encima los survivors son la comunidad mas toxica q he visto en un video juego jamas. Desinstalado hasta que pongan ciertas medidas NECESARIAS. A ver si me leen los desarrolladores y al menos vale pa algo. 
1 Los supervivientes no deberian poder arreglar generador en el estado herido. Me acaban de violar en 4 minutos con la nurse en la picadora xq 4 motores me los han hecho en 2 min ESTANDO HERIDOS. Caja morada y accesorios rosas y los generadores vuelan. 
2 Maximo 1 linterna por grupo. Es simple, que lleven una para intentar defenderse pero es absurdo una partida ayer con la cuervos q llevaban todos linternas y segun tirabas a uno al suelo siempre habia gente cerca. Era pa haberla grabado y q sirva de ejemplo.
3 Los asesinos deberiamos dejar de jugar. Con esto verian q no estamos agusto y tendrian q ajustar cosas. 
A esta mierda de juego o le cambian cosas o le queda hasta q salga el Dragon ball : The breakers me temo
